participant_2.background:
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hey, I'm just hanging out. How about you?
I'm good. I'm just watching highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
That sounds fun! I love watching basketball. I grew up in the Midwest, so I learned to love sports.
I'm from the Midwest too! What was your favorite sport to play?
I loved playing basketball and softball. I was also pretty good at track and field.
That's awesome! I was never very good at sports, but I love watching them.
I'm glad you enjoy them! What's your favorite sport to watch?
I love watching basketball, football, and baseball. I also like watching soccer, but I don't really understand the rules.
I'm not really into soccer either, but I do enjoy watching the World Cup.
Me too! It's always fun to see which countries come out on top.
Do you have any favorite teams?
I'm a big fan of the Chicago Bulls, the Chicago Bears, and the Chicago Cubs.
Those are some great teams! I'm a fan of the Miami Heat, the Miami Dolphins, and the Miami Marlins.
Nice! I've always wanted to go to a game at the Heat's arena.
It's a great arena! I've been to a few games there, and they're always a lot of fun.
I'm sure they are! I'm going to have to try to go to a game sometime soon.
You should! It's a great experience.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about sports.
Me too! It's one of my favorite topics of conversation.
I'm glad to hear that! I think we're going to get along just fine
